submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        diff = [target[i] - nums[i] for i in range(len(nums))]
        idx = 0
        left = 0
        res = 0
        while idx < len(diff):
            temp = abs(diff[left])
            res += temp
            while idx + 1 < len(diff) and diff[idx + 1]*diff[left] > 0:
                if temp < abs(diff[idx + 1]):
                    res += abs(diff[idx + 1]) - temp
                temp = abs(diff[idx + 1])
                idx += 1
            idx += 1
            left = idx
        
        return res
